name: Syncee – Global Dropshipping
author: Syncee

sections.description:
Find trending and niche products with fast shipping on Syncee Marketplace. Upload them to your online store easily and let us automatically update the products & sync your orders! Enjoy the benefits of dropshipping with no upgront investment in product inventory. Dropshipping suppliers from all over the world are waiting to work with you and seamlessly fulfill your customers’ orders.

Millions of products from the US, CA, EU, AU

Syncee is a global B2B dropshipping platform designed to help retailers and suppliers connect. The app’s main solution is Syncee Marketplace where you can find millions of ready-to-sell products from reliable local and global suppliers with fast shipping. Pick products one-by-one from the directory or in bulk by suppliers, and manage them easily.

No upfront investment in stock

In dropshipping, there is no minimum order quantity, no upfront investment in stock, and no inventory risk. The products are available in single units. The supplier ships the products directly to the customers.

Automated product data uploads and updates

With Syncee you can upload products into your WooCommerce store in one click. The app will update the product data daily, automatically so you can avoid overselling.

Automated order processes

After a customer places an order in your store, you can directly pay these products to the supplier. The payment with the order details will be sent directly to the supplier who will ship the products to your customer.

Unique pricing settings

In Syncee, you can set tiered pricing rules and category pricing. Also, you can add fixed or percentage based price margin, and add rounding rules as well.

Free support

Syncee provides free support to all of its users and to those who are interested in the application. On the app’s Help Center you can find useful articles in more languages. If you have any questions, contact the team at email support@syncee.co or via in-app chat.

Enjoy the benefits of Syncee

  • Millions of winning and niche products
  • Reliable, pre-vetted dropshipping suppliers and wholesalers
  • Global & local suppliers with fast shipping
  • AI-based product search
  • Dynamic pricing settings
  • Direct retailer-supplier chat

LOOKING FOR THE BEST DROPSHIPPING PLUGIN FOR YOUR STORE?

Try Syncee now, an excellent alternative to Oberlo, Spocket, Importify, Dropified, CJdropshipping, Modalyst, DSers, DropCommerce, Automizely, Eprolo, Topdser, AutoDS, Spreadr, DropshipMe, NiHaodropshipping, Dropship Express, Dropshipping on Alibaba, BigBuy Dropshipping Connector for WooCommerce, AliExpress Dropshipping with Ali2Woo Lite, Knawat WooCommerce DropShipping, Dropshipping & Affiliation with Amazon, Aliexpress dropshipping for Woocommerce by Wooshark, ALD – Dropshipping and Fulfillment for AliExpress and WooCommerce.
sections.faq:
How much does it cost to use Syncee?

Syncee offers a free Starter plan with access to sourcing products and browsing among 5M+ dropshipping items. Collect the products you love into your Syncee catalog, and upgrade your plan to import products into your online store. Our pricing is based on the product number, not variant SKU. 14-day free trial available.

How do I reach out to Syncee’s customer support?

You can contact Syncee’s support team by email at support@syncee.co, via in-app chat or the website’s live chat. If you have a question you can also check the Help Center for useful articles.

Can I check what Syncee Marketplace offers and how it works in advance?

You can check the product selection on Syncee Marketplace without logging in. It is a limited view of the platform. After registering to Syncee, you can collect products you love, and prepare your catalog with what you want to sell.

Website

syncee.co

Terms of Use

Visit the Syncee plugin’s Terms of Use page

Privacy Policy

Visit the Syncee plugin’s Privacy Policy page

Documentation

After installing and activating the Syncee plugin, click on the Syncee menu in your WordPress admin’s side bar. You will have to allow Syncee to access your WooCommerce store via API. When you are ready with it, you have to register to Syncee. You will be redirected to its individual registration page (installer.syncee.co). This registration is needed so your WooCommerce store can be connected to your Syncee profile. When you are ready with these steps, you can use Syncee with your WordPress WooCommerce store, and can search for and also upload products to your store via the plugin.
For more details on how Syncee works, read the plugin’s Help Center.

sections.reviews:
Exceptional Dropshipping Service

By smartzgadget on March 31, 2024

I’ve been using this dropshipping company for a few months now, and I must say, their service is top-notch. As a beginner in the dropshipping industry, I was looking for a company that could provide efficient and reliable service, and they have exceeded my expectations.

Their product range is extensive, covering everything from clothing and apparel to gadgets and phone accessories. This has allowed me to offer a wide variety of products on my WooCommerce website, meeting the diverse needs of my customers.

What sets them apart is their commitment to timely and efficient order fulfillment. They have a streamlined process that ensures orders are processed quickly and delivered to customers on time. This has significantly improved my customer satisfaction and repeat business.

Moreover, their customer service is excellent. They are always available to answer any questions or concerns I have, making the entire process smooth and hassle-free.

In conclusion, I highly recommend this dropshipping company to anyone looking to start or grow their dropshipping business. Their exceptional service, extensive product range, and commitment to customer satisfaction make them a reliable partner for any dropshipping entrepreneur
